bug.description:
Thanks Breta, Now the output for your images is perfectly working. However I am getting some issue with the following image. <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/36536522/37582315-700bcdfc-2b72-11e8-9da5-2c58cb92cd5b.jpg></denchmark-link>
I tried with and without page.detection(image) but it did not work. Output is like this: <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/36536522/37582437-efa105aa-2b72-11e8-93f7-27ea8210b33d.png></denchmark-link>
I think there is some problem with bounding boxes. The co-ordinates returned are not proper. You can try it for yourself. I can send you the image on your email if you give it.

comments.comment: Hi, thanks for notifying me about the issue. I am aware of it. I am sorry, but I am a little bit busy right now. I will take a look at it as soon as possible.
Thanks in advance for your help. appreciate it.

Hi, I fixed the bug, it was error in rescaling of the bounding boxes. Also I working on new future, so you can try running word detection like: bBoxes = words.detection(crop, join=True) This should join bounding box of word and dot above the 'i', Hope it heps.
Thank you Breta. I appreciate for all of your help till now. This is great.
